document_data.mainbody:
ugney was the proprietor of the Mithrest Inn in the City of Coin, Athkatla, in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Pugney was a portly bald man with fair skin.
Pugneys exclusive inn was located in the grand market named Waukeens Promenade in Athkatlas Center District in the . Pugney shared the latest news from Athkatla to his customers but rarely gossiped. His inn was a calm and quiet establishment and he liked to keep it that way.
